channel.title: Making new items (or modifyed)
channel.description:
hi
i am looking for almost 2 days now about how to make your own items for moparscape can somebody pls send me a link for a tutorial or explain how to do it
thanks in advance
kevin

item.title: Making new items (or modifyed)
item.dc:creator: @xxx123xxx xxx123xxx
item.description:
@xxx123xxx wrote:

[code]ok
lets start out with a basic code like a whip thats easiest and the first i reclolored

if(i == ####) //change the #### to wut ever u want { class8.aStringArray189 = new String[5]; class8.aStringArray189[1] = "Wear"; //this is the new option to equip it, can change to w/e u want class8.anIntArray156 = new int[1]; class8.anIntArray160 = new int[1]; class8.anIntArray156[0] = 528; //original color class8.anIntArray160[0] = 926; //changed color class8.anInt174 = 5412; //model in invetory class8.anInt181 = 840; //zoom increase will make it smaller class8.anInt190 = 280; //model rotate up+down increase to move doen away from you class8.anInt198 = 0; //model rotate side ways increase to move right in circle class8.anInt204 = 0; class8.anInt169 = -2; class8.anInt194 = 56; class8.anInt165 = 5409;//female model when u weild it class8.anInt200 = 5409;//male model when u weild it class8.anInt188 = -1; class8.anInt164 = -1; class8.anInt175 = -1; class8.anInt197 = -1; class8.aString170 = "Dragon Whip"; class8.aByteArray178 = "A whip made of Dragon".getBytes(); }
thats basically how it works
soz if its a crappy tut only had like 2 mins lol[/code]

Read full topic
